trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation returns a list of storage accounts for which one or more import or export jobs have been created for a subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation returns a list of storage accounts for which one or more import or export jobs have been created for a subscription.

trans-unit.source: The following shows a sample request and response for the <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation.
trans-unit.target: The following shows a sample request and response for the <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation returns a list of the storage accounts for which you have created one or more import or export jobs.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>List Storage Accounts</languageKeyword> operation returns a list of the storage accounts for which you have created one or more import or export jobs.
